==History==
It was initially created to be able to easily backup or create a distributable copy of an Ubuntu or derivative installation. Inspiration for this tool came from the <tt>[[mklivecd]]</tt> script that Mandriva uses and the <tt>remasterme</tt> script that is in [[PCLinuxOS]]. Since those scripts are not very easy to port to Ubuntu, it was written from scratch.
